data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here that you want to run after the test script is run.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */
DECLARE @tenTaiKhoan AS NVARCHAR (100) = N'Test', @tenHienThi AS NVARCHAR (100) =N'Test'
delete from dbo.Account WHERE tentaikhoan = @tenTaiKhoan AND tenhienthi = @tenHienThi
